variable.name: waso
variable.description: Calculated - wake after sleep onset (minutes)

variable.name: slp_lat
variable.description: Sleep latency in minutes
variable.comment: if sleep_latency eq 1 then do; slp_lat = slplatp /60;

variable.name: slp_rdi
variable.description: Sleep time in minutes used for calculating RDI only and Arousal Index
variable.comment: slp_rdi = slpprdp/60;

variable.name: slp_time
variable.description: Sleep time in minutes when entire sleep was captured
variable.comment: if restan1 in (.,1) then do; slp_time = slpprdp /60;

variable.name: time_bed
variable.description: Period from Lights off to lights on
variable.comment: time_bed = timebedp/60;

variable.name: slp_eff
variable.description: Sleep efficiency %
variable.comment: if sleep_latency eq 1 and restan1 in (.,1) and timebedp ne 0 then do; slp_eff = 100*(slpprdp)/timebedp;

variable.name: timest1p
variable.description: Pct time stage 1
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timest1p = tmstg1p;

variable.name: timest1
variable.description: Time stage 1 minutes
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timest1 = scstg1p/60;

variable.name: timest2p
variable.description: Pct time stage 2
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timest2p = tmstg2p;

variable.name: timest2
variable.description: Time stage 2 minutes
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timest2 = scstg2p/60;

variable.name: times34p
variable.description: Pct time stage3/4
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; times34p = tmstg34p;

variable.name: timest34
variable.description: Time stage 3/4 minutes
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timest34= scstg34p/60;

variable.name: timeremp
variable.description: Pct time rem
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timeremp = tmremp;

variable.name: timerem
variable.description: Time rem minutes
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timerem = scremp/60;

variable.name: rem_lat1
variable.description: Rem latency I in minutes slp onset to first rem
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and restan2 in (.,0) then do; rem_lat1 = remlaip/60;

variable.name: supinep
variable.description: Pct time supine
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 then do; supinep = 100*(remepbp+nremepbp)/slpprdp;

variable.name: nsupinep
variable.description: Pct time non-supine
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 then do; nsupinep =100*(remepop+nremepop)/slpprdp;

variable.name: ai_all
variable.description: Arousal index all
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and slpprdp gt 0 then do; ai_all = 3600*(arrembp + arremop +arnrembp +arnremop) / slpprdp;

variable.name: ai_rem
variable.description: Arousal index rem sleep
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and scremp gt 0 then do; ai_rem = 3600*(arrembp + arremop) / scremp;

variable.name: ai_nrem
variable.description: Arousal index non-rem
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and slpprdp gt 0 then do; ai_nrem = 3600*(arnrembp +arnremop) / (slpprdp - scremp);

variable.name: rdi0p
variable.description: Overall RDI at 0% desat
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 then do; rdi0p = 3600*(hrembp +hrop + hnrbp + hnrop +carbp+ carop +canbp + canop +oarbp +oarop + oanbp +oanop ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: rdi2p
variable.description: Overall RDI at 2% desat
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 then do; rdi2p = 3600*(hrembp2 +hrop2 + hnrbp2 + hnrop2 +carbp2+ carop2 +canbp2 + canop2 +oarbp2 +oarop2 + oanbp2 +oanop2 ) / slpprdp;
